block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased the contract of RHP Kane Davis from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned LHP Mark Watson to Buffalo. DETROIT TIGERS--Signed RHP Matt Wheatland. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Signed 3B Kelly Eddlemon, RHP Richard Dorman, RHP Timothy Coward, RHP Josh Anderson, CF John Hill and RHP Juan Renteria. TEXAS RANGERS--Signed 2B Tyler Martin and OF Robert Evans, and assigned them to Pulaski of the Appalachian League, and RHP Marion Gleason, RHP Thomas Graham, RHP Reggie Rivard, OF Jason Gray and SS Leland Swenson, and assigned them to the Rangers of the GCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed 3B Nom Siriveaw, RHP Tracy Thorpe, SS Richard Brosseau, C John Blackburn, OF Jeremiah Johnson, OF Brian Sellier, C Chris Small, RHP William Morris, LHP Kris Kozlowski, 2B Thomas Callen, 2B Jeremy Ridley, 1B Stephen Wood, LHP Jeromie Spillman, RHP Daniel Huesgen, C Casey Martinez and LHP Stuart McFarland.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased the contract of RHP Kane Davis from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned LHP Mark Watson to Buffalo. DETROIT TIGERS--Signed RHP Matt Wheatland. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Signed 3B Kelly Eddlemon, RHP Richard Dorman, RHP Timothy Coward, RHP Josh Anderson, CF John Hill and RHP Juan Renteria. TEXAS RANGERS--Signed 2B Tyler Martin and OF Robert Evans, and assigned them to Pulaski of the Appalachian League, and RHP Marion Gleason, RHP Thomas Graham, RHP Reggie Rivard, OF Jason Gray and SS Leland Swenson, and assigned them to the Rangers of the GCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed 3B Nom Siriveaw, RHP Tracy Thorpe, SS Richard Brosseau, C John Blackburn, OF Jeremiah Johnson, OF Brian Sellier, C Chris Small, RHP William Morris, LHP Kris Kozlowski, 2B Thomas Callen, 2B Jeremy Ridley, 1B Stephen Wood, LHP Jeromie Spillman, RHP Daniel Huesgen, C Casey Martinez and LHP Stuart McFarland.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Sent RHP Kenny Lutz to the Los Angeles Dodgers, to complete an earlier trade. NEW YORK METS--Sold the contract of OF Jon Nunnaly to Orix of the Japanese Pacific League.
National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Named Rick Mahorn and Eric Musselman assistant coaches.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS--Named Martin Bayless director of player development-special projects. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Agreed to terms with OL Leander Jordan and DT Gillis Wilson on three-year contracts. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed CB Reggie Austin and K Paul Edinger. DALLAS COWBOYS--Agreed to terms with QB Randall Cunningham on a three-year contract. NEW YORK GIANTS--Named Charles Way director of player programs. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Named Jimmy Raye director of college scouting.
Canadian Football League SASKATCHEWAN ROUGHRIDERS--Signed DB Yudonn Biassou and DB George White.

National Hockey League PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Named Craig Ramsay coach, Mike Stothers assistant coach and John Stevens coach of the Philadelphia Phantoms of the AHL. Announced the resignations of Wayne Cashman, assistant coach; and Bill Barber, coach of the Phantoms.
